long_description: Egg Beater 2 pedals from Crank Brothers are simple, smart and effective. Egg Beaters are redesigned for 2011 to be stronger and better looking than ever. With 4 sides to choose from, pedal entry is easy and reliable; you'll click in quicker than on any other pedal. Unique design and few moving parts allow reliable entry and release even when gunked up with mud. New spindle is manufactured to pass European standards of quality and safety; you'll never need to worry about breaking the spindle. New spring design alleviates wing rattle, spring migration and breakage from fatigue. Watertight and airtight internal parts promote a long life and require little maintenance. Egg Beater 2 pedals feature a cast stainless-steel body and stamped steel wings. 6deg of soft float. Pedals should only be used with the Egg Beater Cleats (included) which will fit almost any SPD-compatible shoe.
short_description: Egg Beater 2 pedals from Crank Brothers are simple, smart and effective. Egg Beaters are redesigned for 2011 to be stronger and better looking than ever.
